Header: Son remanded over Kahawatta murder of mother
Content: The suspect in the murder of a mother of three in Kotakethana, Kahawatta was remanded until June 15. The case was taken up before the Acting Magistrate of Pelmadulla Magistrates Court Sarath Pitagampala. Chandrani Swarnalatha, 39, a mother of three was killed on April 6.  Her son was arrested over the murder.
